descriptionHtml:
This mod replaces the Bethesda Logo when starting Skyrim, with something similar but with a little surprise near the end.

\"CACKA!\"

Mainly created to obfuscate players unknowing of the modification, all for your amusement.

Made featuring an ecstatic expression of a friend while shouting his favorite quote. 

[b]Installation Instructions:[/b]

[i]* Drag and Drop in Your Skyrim Data Folder

* Replace items when prompted[/i]


[b]Uninstallation Instructions:[/b]

[i]* Look in TESVSkyrim Folder Data\\Videos

* Delete BGS_Logo.bik

* Rename BGS_Logo_Default.bik to BGS_Logo.bik[/i]


Video on how to make your own will be posted soon and will be linked here.

[b]Tools used:[/b]
[i]Rad Video Tools
Adobe After Effects
Adobe Premiere Pro[/i]
author: MohawkADE
